comments.content:
Hello  
For last image search for Ventana.  
Alex
The second one is Bilbo, by Rob Leuschke

1. Chiste Tipico. Mathilde by Lee Batchelor [http://www.dafont.com/mathilde.font?text=Chiste+Tipico](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317220859/http:/www.dafont.com/mathilde.font?text=Chiste+Tipico)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317220859im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chiste1_4911.jpg)
